title: Implement quit on escape
summary: Add functionality to quit the application when the user presses the escape key.

success_criteria.text: The application exits gracefully when the escape key is pressed.

acceptance_checks.text: Run the CLI and press escape to confirm it quits.

todo.text: Identify the main CLI loop or input handling mechanism.
Implement a check for the escape key press.
Add logic to terminate the application when escape is detected.

changelog.text: Implemented and verified quit on escape functionality.

decisions: Used `menu_choice is None` to detect escape key press in `questionary.select`.
lessons_learned: Interactive CLI commands cannot be directly tested via `run_shell_command` due to TTY limitations.
